alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dale, southwestern Henry and northwestern Houston Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newton, or 7 miles southeast of Ozark, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Headland, Dothan, Fort Novosel, Ozark, Enterprise, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Newton, Webb, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Newville, Napier Field, Hollis Dairy Road, Hunt Field, Waterford and Tumbleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
